snippet: The slower pace of hiring in April suggests the Fed may be a little less likely to raise its interest rates again next month.
abstract: Stocks rise moderately, despite weak jobs report.
lead_paragraph: The slower pace of hiring in April suggests the Fed may be a little less likely to raise its interest rates again next month.

headline.main: Small Gain for the Market After a Weak Jobs Report
headline.print_headline: Market Gains Modestly Despite Weak Jobs Data
